title: Yoga - Seven Kings High School Tue 15 September 2015
content:
Yoga can help relieve some of the stresses and strains that everyday life can bring.

Sports and social activities brought to you by the Vision Redbridge Culture & Leisure Sport & Health Team. Part of the . This class is pay as you go, no need to book, just turn up!
